name: Lovesick (Deep Plaid Games)
description:
A persuasive argument against consuming undercooked shrimp on the night of one's nuptials.

For two players with a strong gag reflex.

Rotate your character left or right. Your character is constantly firing projectiles; hold the action button to stop firing projectiles and thrust forward instead.

The winner is whoever gets the most projectiles in the toilet.

Developers: Shay Pierce; Eduardo Ortiz Frau; Sabrina Rodriguez

Voices: Christina Parrish; David Howe; Sabrina Rodriguez
